location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at f 1, and terminates at f 2, as it is part of a larger physical volume; these numbers are written in pencil, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. Pagination: the item also contains an original printed pagination sequence.

mods.abstract: The memorandum concerns proposals for a more equitable distribution of the costs of the Persian Mission between the Imperial (i.e. British) and Indian Governments. It includes tables detailing the proposed breakdown of costs for each government. The author is Edmund Neel of the India Office, Political and Secret Department.
